title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Peer Assessment-Based Learning Design in Online Higher Education Science Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate the qualitative level of science projects using peer assessment criteria, categorizing them into three tiers (basic/intermediate/advanced)
Learners achieve an 80% or higher response rate to peer feedback and engage in constructive communication in online environments.
Learners enhance metacognitive abilities by writing self-reflection journals three or more times during the peer assessment process.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
